hot sandwich.name: Meatball
hot sandwich.description: This sandwich is really all you'll ever need. It's perfect in every way

hot sandwich.name: Panini
hot sandwich.description: This sandwich is renowned for being cooked in an Easy-Bake Oven

hot sandwich.name: French Dip
hot sandwich.description: This sandwich should be washed in the accompanying bath of au jus before consumption

cold sandwich.name: Jimmy John's Veggie
cold sandwich.description: This is all my wife can eat when she's pregnant. A lifesaver

cold sandwich.name: Cranberry-Walnut Chicken Salad Sandwich
cold sandwich.description: I took this from the internet: https://www.tasteofhome.com/recipes/cranberry-walnut-chicken-salad-sandwiches/

appetizer.name: Spring rolls
appetizer.description: A tube for eating and it's not toothpaste

appetizer.name: Party bread
appetizer.description: This is copious amounts of bread and cheese and will almost certainly end you. What's that? I'm not supposed to eat it all by myself?

drink.name: Root beer
drink.description: Made from tree roots and bark, make sure you don't get ice

drink.name: Sprite
drink.description: Made from water and flavoring, make sure you don't get ice

dessert.name: Cheesecake
dessert.description: Decadent and needlessly heavy, if the party bread didn't get you, this probably will instead
